abstract: Musician and record producer Nile Rodgers has published memoir, Le Freak: An Upside Down Story of Family, Disco and Destiny.; book details how Rodgers went from chaotic and frequently dangerous childhood to making gorgeously ordered music.
snippet: The musician and record producer Nile Rodgers has published a memoir, “Le Freak: An Upside Down Story of Family, Disco and Destiny.”
lead_paragraph: The musician and record producer Nile Rodgers has published a memoir, “Le Freak: An Upside Down Story of Family, Disco and Destiny.”

headline.main: A Hit Maker’s Life and Lyrics
headline.print_headline: A Hit Maker’s Life and Lyrics
headline.seo: Nile Rodgers’s New Music Memoir Is ‘Le Freak’
